title: iVR-Based Science Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic scientific concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Emphasizes understanding science principles applicable to workplace tasks for office/management professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain science concepts with 80% accuracy by applying multimedia learning principles (CTML) in immersive VR (iVR) environments
Learners can reproduce science experiment procedures in three or more steps using virtual reality-based simulation tools
When designing an iVR learning environment, one can propose at least two strategies for managing cognitive load.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
